name: setup-swig
description: GitHub action to download and setup SWIG

scripts.prepare: git log -1 --pretty='format:{ "git": "%h" }' > src/git.json && npx ncc build src/index.ts -m -o dist
scripts.test:jse:latest: rm -rf install/tmp && mkdir -p install/tmp && RUNNER_TEMP=install/tmp RUNNER_TOOL_CACHE=install INPUT_VERSION=latest INPUT_BRANCH=jse INPUT_CACHE=false INPUT_VERBOSE=true node dist/index.js && install/swig/swig-jse -version
scripts.test:jse:main: rm -rf install/tmp && mkdir -p install/tmp && RUNNER_TEMP=install/tmp RUNNER_TOOL_CACHE=install INPUT_VERSION=main INPUT_BRANCH=jse INPUT_CACHE=false INPUT_VERBOSE=true node dist/index.js && install/swig/swig-jse -version

author: mmomtchev
